briefdescription.para: Reads actual pressure from uncompensated pressure and returns pressure in Pa as double.

simplesect.para: Output value of "96386.2" equals 96386.2 Pa = 963.862 hPa.

briefdescription.para: Reads actual pressure from uncompensated pressure and returns the value in Pascal(Pa)

simplesect.para: Output value of "96386" equals 96386 Pa = 963.86 hPa = 963.86 millibar
Returns the Actual pressure out put as s32

briefdescription.para: This API used to read actual pressure from uncompensated pressure.

simplesect.para: returns the value in Pa as unsigned 32 bit integer in Q24.8 format (24 integer bits and 8 fractional bits). Output value of "24674867" represents 24674867 / 256 = 96386.2 Pa = 963.862 hPa

briefdescription.para: This API used to read actual temperature from uncompensated temperature.

simplesect.para: Returns the value in Degree centigrade

briefdescription.para: Reads actual temperature from uncompensated temperature.

simplesect.para: Returns the value in 0.01 degree Centigrade

briefdescription.para: Computing waiting time for sensor data read.
This API is used to calibration parameters used for calculation in the registers.

briefdescription.para: This API used to read both uncompensated pressure and temperature in forced mode.

value

0x01 and 0x02

briefdescription.para: This function is used for initialize the bus read and bus write functions and assign the chip id and I2C address of the BMP280 sensor chip id is read in the register 0xD0 bit from 0 to 7.

simplesect.para: While changing the parameter of the p_bmp280

consider the following point: Changing the reference value of the parameter will changes the local copy or local reference make sure your changes will not affect the reference value of the parameter (Better case don't change the reference value of the parameter)

briefdescription.para: This API reads the true pressure and temperature.
This API reads the data from the given register.
This API is used to read uncompensated pressure. in the registers 0xF7, 0xF8 and 0xF9.
reads uncompensated pressure and temperature

briefdescription.para: Used to reset the sensor The value 0xB6 is written to the 0xE0 register the device is reset using the complete power-on-reset procedure. Softreset can be easily set using bmp280_set_softreset().
This API used to set the sensor SPI mode(communication type) in the register 0xF5 bit 0.

parameterdescription.para:
: The spi3 enable or disable state
value
Description
0
Disable
1
Enable

briefdescription.para: This API used to Read the standby duration time from the sensor in the register 0xF5 bit 5 to 7.

simplesect.para: Normal mode comprises an automated perpetual cycling between an (active) Measurement period and an (inactive) standby period.
The standby time is determined by the contents of the register t_sb. Standby time can be set using BMP280_STANDBYTIME_125_MS.

parameterdescription.para:
: The standby duration time value.
value
standby duration
0x00
BMP280_STANDBYTIME_1_MS
0x01
BMP280_STANDBYTIME_63_MS
0x02
BMP280_STANDBYTIME_125_MS
0x03
BMP280_STANDBYTIME_250_MS
0x04
BMP280_STANDBYTIME_500_MS
0x05
BMP280_STANDBYTIME_1000_MS
0x06
BMP280_STANDBYTIME_2000_MS
0x07
BMP280_STANDBYTIME_4000_MS
